name: Industrisle
description:
Just a prototype of some game i made, I hope ill update it to add new features once every 2 days up to a week from now

Tutorial for Version 0.0.1 (ill delete this later):

-move around using the arrow keys

-change the tool you're placing by pressing either 1 or 2 (1 for wood floor and 2 for wood wall)

-right click to place stuff and left click to destroy stuff
